mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onestoit_case_apply ( case_id, employee_id, apply_date, bind ) VALUES ( #{caseId}, #{employeeId}, #{applyDate}, false );
mapper.update: UPDATE onestoit_case_apply set bind = true where case_id = #{caseId} and employee_id = #{employeeId};
mapper.select: select CA.case_id, CA.employee_id, bind, case_name, bonus_money, bonus_money_negotiable, develop_tools, description, deadline, status from onestoit_case_apply CA inner join onestoit_case_base CB WHERE CA.case_id = CB.case_id AND employee_id = #{employeeId};

SELECT CB.case_id, CA.bind, CB.STATUS, CB.case_name, CB.customer_id, CB.bonus_money, CB.bonus_money_negotiable, CB.develop_tools, CB.description, CB.deadline, CA.employee_id, EB.name, EB.gender, EB.skill, EB.birthday from onestoit_case_base CB LEFT join onestoit_case_apply CA on CB.case_id = CA.case_id LEFT join onestoit_employee_base EB on EB.employee_id = CA.employee_id where CB.customer_id = #{customerId} order by CB.case_id;
